verses.verse: Which <S%H7971>sends<s%> <S%H6735>envoys<s%> by the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> Even in <S%H1573>papyrus<s%> <S%H3627>vessels<s%> on the <S%H6440>surface<s%> of the <S%H4325>waters.<s%> <S%H1980>Go,<s%> <S%H7031>swift<s%> <S%H4397>messengers,<s%> to a <S%H1471>nation<s%> <S%H4900>tall<s%> and <S%H4803>smooth,<s%> To a <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3372>feared<s%> <S%H4480>far<s%> <S%H1931><s%> and <S%H1973>wide,<s%> A <S%H6978>powerful<s%> and <S%H4001>oppressive<s%> <S%H1471>nation<s%> <S%H834>Whose<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> the <S%H5104>rivers<s%> <S%H958>divide.<s%>

<S%H3605>All<s%> you <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H8398>world<s%> and <S%H7931>dwellers<s%> on <S%H776>earth,<s%> As soon as a <S%H5251>standard<s%> is <S%H5375>raised<s%> on the <S%H2022>mountains,<s%> you will <S%H7200>see<s%> [it,] And as soon as the <S%H7782>trumpet<s%> is <S%H8628>blown,<s%> you will <S%H8085>hear<s%> [it.]

For <S%H3541>thus<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H559>told<s%> me, "I will <S%H5027>look<s%> from My <S%H4349>dwelling<s%> <S%H4349>place<s%> <S%H8252>quietly<s%> Like <S%H6703>dazzling<s%> <S%H2527>heat<s%> in the <S%H216>sunshine,<s%> Like a <S%H5645>cloud<s%> of <S%H2919>dew<s%> in the <S%H2527>heat<s%> of <S%H7105>harvest.<s%>"

For <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H7105>harvest,<s%> as soon as the <S%H6525>bud<s%> <S%H8552>blossoms<s%> And the <S%H5328>flower<s%> <S%H1961>becomes<s%> a <S%H1580>ripening<s%> <S%H1155>grape,<s%> Then He will <S%H3772>cut<s%> <S%H3772>off<s%> the <S%H2150>sprigs<s%> with <S%H4211>pruning<s%> <S%H4211>knives<s%> And <S%H5493>remove<s%> [and] <S%H8456>cut<s%> <S%H8456>away<s%> the <S%H5189>spreading<s%> <S%H5189>branches.<s%>

They will be <S%H5800>left<s%> <S%H9191>together<s%> for <S%H2022>mountain<s%> <S%H5861>birds<s%> of <S%H5861>prey,<s%> And for the <S%H929>beasts<s%> of the <S%H776>earth;<s%> And the <S%H5861>birds<s%> of <S%H5861>prey<s%> will <S%H9517>spend<s%> the <S%H9517>summer<s%> [feeding] on them, And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H929>beasts<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> will <S%H9175>spend<s%> <S%H9175>harvest<s%> <S%H9175>time<s%> on them.

At that <S%H6256>time<s%> a <S%H7862>gift<s%> of <S%H7862>homage<s%> will be <S%H2986>brought<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> From a <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H4900>tall<s%> and <S%H4803>smooth,<s%> Even from a <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3372>feared<s%> <S%H4480>far<s%> <S%H1931><s%> and <S%H1973>wide,<s%> A <S%H6978>powerful<s%> and <S%H4001>oppressive<s%> <S%H1471>nation,<s%> <S%H834>Whose<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> the <S%H5104>rivers<s%> <S%H958>divide<s%> â€“ To the <S%H4725>place<s%> of the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> [even] <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H6726>Zion.<s%>
